original_text: I know what you are thinking. You want to show that I am guilty. I know what you are thinking. You want to show that I am guilty. I know what you are thinking. You want to show that I am guilty. I know what you are thinking. You want to show that I am guilty. I know what you are thinking.
korean_text: 내가 너희의 생각을 알고 너희가 나를 해하려는 속셈도 아노라

sentences.original_text: I know what you are thinking.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신이 무엇을 생각하고 있는지 압니다.

sentences.original_text: You want to show that I am guilty.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내가 유죄하다는 것을 보이고 싶어 합니다.
